GK17kvrtrsuu:1498: aparaṃ lavalyāṃ sarvamapi prāktanaṃ prastutaṃ pūrvavaditi bhavati / yathā /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1514: piṃgalanāgastu padacaturūrdhvādiṣu prathamapādaviparyāse sati maṃjaryādi nāmāni vīkṣyati // 5 //
GK17kvrtrsuu:1518: tryaṅdhrigatabhanajalā gayutā sajasā jagau caraṇamekata paṭhet // KVrk_5.6 //
GK17kvrtrsuu:1519_0: prathamapāde sagaṇajagaṇasagaṇā laghuśca tathā dvitīyapāde nagaṇasagaṇajagaṇaguravo
GK17kvrtrsuu:1520: caturthe caraṇe sagaṇajagaṇasagaṇā jagaṇo guruśca yatra sā udgatā nāma /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1524: vīkṣya sapadi yuvatiṃ vikṛtiṃ niyataṃ prayāti vipulodgatāstanuḥ // 6 //
GK17kvrtrsuu:1526: rnau bhagau bhavati saurabhakaṃ caraṇe yadīha bhavatastṛtīyake // KVrk_5.7 //

GK17kvrtrsuu:1530: nayugaṃ sakārayugalaṃ ca bhavati caraṇe tṛtīyake /

GK17kvrtrsuu:1532: yadyudgatāyāstṛtīye caraṇe dvau nagaṇau dvau sagaṇau ca bhavataḥ tadā lalitaṃ nāma /

GK17kvrtrsuu:1547: nau pāde 'tha tṛtīyake sanau nasayuktau prathamāṅdhrikṛtayatistu vardhamānam /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1548: tritayamaparamapi pūrvasadṛśamiha bhavati pratatamatibhiriti gaditaṃ khalu vṛttam // KVrk_5.10 //
GK17kvrtrsuu:1549_0: tadeva padacaturūrdhvaṃ tṛtīye pāde nagaṇau sagaṇanagaṇau ca bhavataḥ prathamasya
GK17kvrtrsuu:1549_1: caturūrdhvasyāṅdhiḥ prathamāṅdhrivat kṛtā yatiryasya kriyāviśeṣaṇasya tatprathamāṅdhrikṛtayatiryathā bhavati /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1550: evamaparapādatrayaṃ pūrvasadṛśamiha tantre tadvṛttaṃ ācāryairvardhamānaṃ nāmoktam / yathā /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1553: asminneva tṛtīyake pāde tajarā syuḥ prathame ca viratirārṣabhaṃ bruvanti /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1554: tacchuddhavirāṭpuraḥ sthitaṃ tritayamaparamapi yadi pūrvasamaṃ syāt // KVrk_5.11 //
GK17kvrtrsuu:1555: asminneva padacaturūrdhvavṛtte tṛtīye pāde tagaṇajagaṇaragaṇā bhaveyuḥ,
GK17kvrtrsuu:1556: aparaṃ pādatrayamapi pūrvasamaṃ bhavati tadā śuddhavirāṭpuraḥsthitaṃ ārṣabhaṃ vadanti śuddhavirāḍārṣabhamityarthaḥ / yathā /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1561: yacchaṃdo noktamatra gātheti tatsūribhiḥ proktam // KVrk_5.12 //
GK17kvrtrsuu:1562: viṣamākṣarāṇi yeṣu te pādā yasmin viṣamākṣarapādaṃ yadevameva aṣṭau daśasaptanavākṣaraṃ vā sarvapādairasamaṃ tripādaṃ ṣaṭpādaṃ vā daśadharmavat / yathā /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1563: daśa dharmaṃ na jānanti dhṛtirāṣṭra nibodha tān /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1565: tvaramāṇaśa bhīruśca lubdhaḥ kāmī ca te daśaḥ //
GK17kvrtrsuu:1567: ityevamādi asmin cchaṃdasyarthe noktaṃ prayogeṣu dṛśyate tadgātheti vidvadbhiruktam /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1570: iti sulhaṇaviracitāyāṃ sukavihṛdayānandinyabhidhānāyāṃ vṛttaratnākaracchaṃdovṛttau viṣamavṛttādhyāyaḥ paṃcamaḥ //
GK17kvrtrsuu:1575: saṃkhyā caivādhvayogaśca ṣaḍete pratyayāḥ smṛtāḥ // KVrk_6.1 //
GK17kvrtrsuu:1578: yathopari tathā śeṣaṃ bhūyaḥ kuryādamuṃ vidhim // KVrk_6.2 //
GK17kvrtrsuu:1581: pāde sarvagurau yāvatāṃ varṇānāṃ vṛttasya pādastāvaṃta eva guravo vilikhyante /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1583: caturakṣaracchaṃdasi ādyādguroradhaḥ adhovibhāge laghuṃ varṇaṃ nyasya sthāpayitvā tadanaṃtaraṃ nyastalaghoḥ sakāśāt śeṣebhyo varṇebhyo adhaḥ kiṃ sthāpyata ityāha /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1585: yadyupari gurustadā adhastādapi gururyadyupari laghustadā adhastādapi laghuḥ śeṣam /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1589: laghuṃ nyasya guroradhaḥ yathopari tathā śeṣamiti punarapyamuṃ vidhiṃ kuryāt /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1590: yadā upari gururbhavati laghuṃ nyasya guroradha iti vidherabhāvādyaḥ pūrvadeśādūne dadyādgurūṇi iti ūnapradeśo gurubhiḥ pūryata ityarthaḥ /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1591: evamanena prakāreṇa tāvannyāsaḥ kartavyo yāvatsarvalaghuḥ pado bhavati /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1598: naṣṭasya yo bhavedaṃkaḥ tasyārdhe 'rdhe same ca laḥ /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1600: prastāradarśitānāṃ vṛttānāṃ madhye yadvṛttaṃ naṣṭaṃ luptaṃ bhavati tasya naṣṭasya yo bhavedaṃka ekādisaṃkhyā tasya ardhe 'rdhe same ca aṃke sati lo laghurbhavati /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1601: viṣame ekaṃ ādhāya prakṣipya tasyārdhe 'rdhe gururbhavet /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1603: tasya aṃkaḥ paṃca sa ca ardhaṃ na prayacchati /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1607: tadardhe guruḥ prāpyate punastrayo 'rdhaṃ na prayacchanti /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1610: tadardhe laghuḥ prāpyate punareko 'rdhaṃ na prayacchati /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1614: ādyau dvau gurū tābhyāṃ parako laghustato gururiti /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1620: laghusthā ye tu tatrāṃkāstaiḥ saikairmiśritairbhavet // KVrk_6.5 //
GK17kvrtrsuu:1621: kenacittadvṛttaṃ prastāryakatamat iti saṃkhyāparijñānā uktaṃ taduddiṣṭamucyate /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1624: atra punarvṛttaṃ jñāyate saṃkhyā na jñāyate ataḥ saṃkhyāparijñānārthaṃ uddiṣṭamidamucyate /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1625: tasya uddiṣṭavṛttasya prathamādakṣarādārabhya upari dviguṇānaṃkān samālikhet /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1627: asminneva caturākṣare chaṃdasi ekaṃ vṛttaṃ uddiṣṭaṃ tasya dvau varṇau gurū tato laghustato 'pi guruḥ /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1628: tatra uddiṣṭe vṛtte laghuni tiṣṭhantīti laghusthā ye punaraṃkāścatvāraḥ taiścaturbhiḥ saikaiḥ ekena sahitaiḥ paṃcabhiruddiṣṭaṃ bhavet /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1637: yāvaṃta eva vṛttabhavā varṇā tāvata eva saikān ekasahitānyathā /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1638: caturakṣarajātau catvāro ye varṇāstān saikān paṃca /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1639: auttarādharyataḥsthitān uparyuparibhāvena sthitān ekādikrameṇaiva etānupari upari nikṣipet nidadhyāt /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1642: evamanena prakāreṇa kasmādiyaṃ ekadvyādilagukriyāṃ pravartata ityāha /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1648: ‘pāde sarvagurāvādyāllaghuṃ nyasye'ti tena tasmāt adha iyaṃ ekadvyādilagukriyā pravartate /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1649: tatra paṃcasu varṇeṣu uttarādharabhāvena sthāpiteṣu adhaḥsthita ekastaduparisthe nikṣipyate /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1650_0: sa ca tathaiva tiṣṭhati tyajannekaikamūrdhvata iti vīpsavaśādekadaiva sthitimaṃtareṇa
GK17kvrtrsuu:1650_1: nikṣiptatvāt punarnikṣepabhāvādekaikatyāgaśca na saṃbhavati tasmātsvarūpeṇa sthita
GK17kvrtrsuu:1651: tato dvitīye sthāne dvau varṇau bhavataḥ tau tṛtīyena kṣipyeta tatra trayo bhavanti /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1652: tacca caturthe nikṣipyante te catvāro bhavanti /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1653: ‘upāntyato nivartate tyajannekaikamūrdhvataḥ' uparitanamekaṃ tyajyate tatra na kṣipyate ityarthaḥ /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1654: vīpsā ta eva adhobhāgāt punarnikṣepe kriyā pravartate tena adhaḥsthita eva eko dvitīye sthāne nikṣipyate tatra ca trayo bhavanti /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1655: tacca tṛtīye nikṣipyante tatra ṣaṭbhavanti upari ekaṃ tyajannivarteta /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1656: ādyaṃ ekaṃ vṛttaṃ sarvaguruḥ tasmāddekadvyādilagukriyā pravartete /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1657_0: tata ekaḥ sarvaguruḥ catvāri dvilaghūni ṣaṭtrilaghūni catvāri caturlaghūni ekaṃ sarvalaghuḥ
GK17kvrtrsuu:1657_1: eṣā lagukriyā sarvalaghuprastāreṇa pratīyate asyāstu eṣa eva kramaḥ paṃcākṣarādivṛtteṣvapi // 6-7 //
GK17kvrtrsuu:1668: lagukriyāyāṃ ye aṃkāsteṣāṃ sandohastasminvimiśrite pīḍīkṛte saṃkhyā bhavet /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1670: tathā ekaścatvāraḥ ṣaṭcatvāraḥ ekameṣāmekīkṛtā vai ṣoḍaśa bhavanti caturakṣarajātau prastāryamāṇāyāṃ ṣoḍaśa vṛttāni bhavantītyarthaḥ /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1673: uddiṣṭasya vṛttasya upari ye aṃkā dviguṇāsteṣāṃ samāhāraḥ ekībhāvaḥ saiko vā athavā janayedutpādayedimāṃ saṃkhyām /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1675: caturakṣarajātau dviguṇā ye aṃkā uparyāropitāsteṣāṃ samāhāraḥ paṃcadaśa saikaḥ ṣoḍaśeti // 8 //
